channel.title: RSPS VPS Help [Rep++]
channel.description:
Hey, I recently purchased a Windows 2008 VPS, and I was curious on how to configure the firewall settings to enable my server to be online. When I go to run my custom No-IP, it says, "error connecting to server." on my No-IP DUC. I'm not looking to run my server off of my VPS IP address to protect my server from DDoS attacks, so I want to use my custom No-IP; so could someone walk me through the steps to set this up?
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: RSPS VPS Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
